fd:scripts.fd:valueCommit: [{"script":{"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.FirstSubmitPPCon.Attach1PPCon"\,"event":"Value Commit"\,"model":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"}\,"content":"var docs=[];\\nguideBridge.getFileAttachmentsInfo({\\n success:function(list) {\\n for(var i=0; i<list.length;i++){\\n if(list[i].path.toString().split(\\".pdf\\").length>2){\\n var splitString = list[i].path.toString().split(\\".pdf\\");\\n var splitStringNeeded = splitString[0].split(\\"/\\"\,5);\\n var splitStringFinal = splitStringNeeded.join('/');\\n var finalString = splitString.join(\\".pdf\,\\"+splitStringFinal+\\"/\\").split(\\"\,\\");\\n var lastEle = finalString.pop();\\n for(var path in finalString){\\n //console.log(path);\\n if(finalString[path].includes(\\"Attach1PPCon\\")||finalString[path].includes(\\"Attach2PPCon\\")||finalString[path].includes(\\"Attach3PPCon\\")){\\n \\tdocs.push(finalString[path].replace(/\\\\n/g\,''));\\n }\\n }\\n }\\n else{\\n if(list[i].path.includes(\\"Attach1PPCon\\")||list[i].path.includes(\\"Attach2PPCon\\")||list[i].path.includes(\\"Attach3PPCon\\")){\\n docs.push(list[i].path);\\n }\\n }\\n }\\n FilePathsPPCon.value = docs;\\n }\\n});"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

fd:scripts.fd:valueCommit: [{"script":{"content":"var docs=[];\\nguideBridge.getFileAttachmentsInfo({\\n success:function(list) {\\n for(var i=0; i<list.length;i++){\\n if(list[i].path.toString().split(\\".pdf\\").length>2){\\n var splitString = list[i].path.toString().split(\\".pdf\\");\\n var splitStringNeeded = splitString[0].split(\\"/\\"\,5);\\n var splitStringFinal = splitStringNeeded.join('/');\\n var finalString = splitString.join(\\".pdf\,\\"+splitStringFinal+\\"/\\").split(\\"\,\\");\\n var lastEle = finalString.pop();\\n for(var path in finalString){\\n //console.log(path);\\n if(finalString[path].includes(\\"Attach2PPCon\\")||finalString[path].includes(\\"Attach1PPCon\\")||finalString[path].includes(\\"Attach3PPCon\\")){\\n \\tdocs.push(finalString[path].replace(/\\\\n/g\,''));\\n }\\n }\\n }\\n else{\\n if(list[i].path.includes(\\"Attach2PPCon\\")||list[i].path.includes(\\"Attach1PPCon\\")||list[i].path.includes(\\"Attach3PPCon\\")){\\n docs.push(list[i].path);\\n }\\n }\\n }\\n FilePathsPPCon.value = docs;\\n }\\n});"\,"event":"Value Commit"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.FirstSubmitPPCon.Attach2PPCon"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

fd:scripts.fd:click:
[{"script":{"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.SubmitPPCon"\,"event":"Click"\,"model":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"}\,"content":"if(backgroundPPCon.value !== \\"\\" && backgroundPPCon.value!==null && contractorPPCon.value !== \\"\\" && contractorPPCon.value!==null){\\nvar jsonData={};\\nvar disputeArray=[];\\nthis.enabled=false;\\njsonData.templateName=\\"CEM6212-Contractor.xdp\\";\\njsonData.RelatedPerson={\\"Caltrans\\":\\"0\\"\,\\"Contractor\\":\\"1\\"};\\nif(SelectDRADRB.value===\\"DRB\\"){\\n jsonData.ProjectInfo={\\n \\"ContractNumber\\": ContractNumberDRB.value\,\\n \\"Date\\": DateDRB.value\,\\n \\"DisputeMeetingID\\": DisputeMeetIDHide.value\,\\n \\"REName\\": ResidentEngineerDRB.value\,\\n \\"REPhoneNo\\": PhoneNumberDRB.value\,\\n \\"ContractorName\\": ContractorDRB.value\\n };\\n}\\nelse if(SelectDRADRB.value===\\"DRA\\"){\\n jsonData.ProjectInfo={\\n \\"ContractNumber\\": ContractNumberDRA.value\,\\n \\"Date\\": DateDRA.value\,\\n \\"DisputeMeetingID\\": DisputeMeetIDHide.value\,\\n \\"REName\\": ResidentEngineerDRA.value\,\\n \\"REPhoneNo\\": PhoneNumberDRA.value\,\\n \\"ContractorName\\": ContractorDRA.value\\n };\\n}\\nvar PCRArray=[];\\nvar PCRList = PCPPPCon.Row1PPCon.instanceManager.instances;\\nfor(var i=0;i < PCPPPCon.Row1PPCon.instanceManager.instanceCount;i++){\\n if(i!==0){\\n \\tvar eachPCR={};\\n eachPCR.PCRNo = PCRList[i].tableItem11.value;\\n eachPCR.Description = PCRList[i].tableItem12.value;\\n if(PCRList[i].tableItem13.value !== null){\\n eachPCR.DollarValue=PCRList[i].tableItem13.value.toString().substring(2);\\n }\\n else{\\n eachPCR.DollarValue=\\"\\";\\n }\\n eachPCR.DelayDays=PCRList[i].tableItem14.value;\\n eachPCR.SupplementalDate=PCRList[i].tableItem15.value;\\n eachPCR.DateREResponseTOSPCR=PCRList[i].tableItem16.value;\\n eachPCR.DateRefer=PCRList[i].tableItem17.value;\\n PCRArray.push(eachPCR);\\n }\\n}\\njsonData.DisputeDetails=PCRArray;\\njsonData.DisputeBackground={\\"Background\\": backgroundPPCon.value};\\njsonData.ContractorsPosition={\\"PositionCon\\": contractorPPCon.value};\\njsonData.FilePaths=FilePathsPPCon.value;\\njsonData.DRType=SelectDRADRB.value;\\njsonData.userRole=userRole.value;\\njsonData.ea=ea.value;\\njsonData.district=district.value;\\njsonData.userID=userID.value;\\njsonData.HostPath=window.location.protocol+\\"//\\"+window.location.hostname+\\":\\"+window.location.port;\\nvar count = DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instanceCount-1;\\nvar disList = DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances;\\nfor(var i=0;i < count;i++){\\n if(disList[i].tableItem11.value==='Y'){\\n jsonData.MeetingType = disList[i].table1_item3.value;\\n jsonData.TypeofMeet = disList[i].table1_item3.value.toUpperCase();\\n break;\\n }\\n}\\n\\n//console.log(jsonData);\\nxmlData = OBJtoXML1({\\"data\\":jsonData});\\nurl = 'http://'+window.location.hostname+':8080/rest/services/Caltrans-eADR/Processes/InsertPositionPaperRecord';\\n$.ajax({ \\n type: 'POST'\,\\n headers: {\\n 'Content-Type' : 'application/xml'\,\\n 'Accept' : '*/*'\\n }\,\\n url: url\,\\n data: xmlData\,\\n //data: data1\,\\n success: function (data) {\\n //console.log(data);\\n PosSucMssgePPCon.visible=true;\\n PosSucMssgePPCon.value=\\"

Details Submitted Successfully

\\";\\n PosErrMssgePPCon.visible=false;\\n this.enabled=false;\\n setTimeout(function alertFunc() {\\n PreviewPPCon.visible=true;\\n }\, 700); \\n }\,\\n error: function(err){\\n //this block is executed when server encounters any problem\\n \\tPreviewPPCon.visible=false;\\n PosSucMssgePPCon.visible=false;\\n PosErrMssgePPCon.value=\\"

Something went wrong

\\";\\n PosErrMssgePPCon.visible=true;\\n this.enabled=true;\\n }\\n});\\n}\\nelse{\\n PosSucMssgePPCon.visible=false;\\n PosErrMssgePPCon.value=\\"

Please enter BACKGROUND OF THE DISPUTE and/or CONTRACTOR'S POSITION fields

\\";\\n PosErrMssgePPCon.visible=true;\\n}"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

Details successfully submitted\\";\\n PosAddiErrMssgePPCon.visible=false;\\n this.enabled=false;\\n setTimeout(function alertFunc() {\\n \\tAddInfoPreviewPPCon.visible=true;\\n }\, 700); \\n }\,\\n error: function(err){\\n //this block is executed when server encounters any problem\\n PosAddiSucMssgePPCon.visible=false;\\n PosAddiErrMssgePPCon.visible=true;\\n PosAddiErrMssgePPCon.value=\\"

fd:scripts.fd:click:
[{"script":{"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.ButtonsPanelPPCon.ClickRecomPPCon"\,"event":"Click"\,"model":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"}\,"content":"//SubmitAddPPCon.visible=false;\\n//AddInfoPreviewPPCon.visible=false;\\nvar count = guideBridge.resolveNode(\\"DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager\\").instanceCount-1;\\nvar meetingType\,disputeID;\\nvar disList = guideBridge.resolveNode(\\"DisputeDashDisTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances\\");\\nfor(var i=0;i < count;i++){\\n if(disList[i].tableItem11.value==='Y'){\\n meetingType = disList[i].table1_item3.value;\\n disputeID = disList[i].table1_item1.value;\\n break;\\n }\\n}\\nif(meetingType.toUpperCase()===\\"INFORMAL\\"){\\n ReqResPanelPPCon.visible=false;\\n}\\nelse{\\n ReqResPanelPPCon.visible=true;\\n}\\nvar jsonData = {\\n \\"ea\\" : guideBridge.resolveNode(\\"ea\\").value\,\\n \\"district\\" : guideBridge.resolveNode(\\"district\\").value\,\\n \\"DisputeID\\" : disputeID\,\\n \\"MeetingType\\" : meetingType\,\\n \\"DRType\\" : guideBridge.resolveNode(\\"SelectDRADRB\\").value\,\\n \\"role\\" : \\"CONTRACTOR\\"\\n};\\nxmlData = OBJtoXML1({\\"data\\":jsonData});\\nurl = 'http://'+window.location.hostname+':8080/rest/services/Caltrans-eADR/Processes/GetRecommResponseDetails';\\n$.ajax({ \\n type: 'POST'\,\\n headers: {\\n 'Content-Type' : 'application/xml'\,\\n 'Accept' : '*/*'\\n }\,\\n url: url\,\\n data: xmlData\,\\n success: function (data) {\\n //console.log(data);\\n //guideBridge.setFocus(ReqClariPPCon.somExpression);\\n var recom_created_date = new Date(data.getElementsByTagName(\\"RecomCreatedDate\\")[0].innerHTML);\\n var todaydate = new Date();\\n if(SelectDRADRB.value === \\"DRB\\" && meetingType===\\"Traditional\\"){\\n recom_created_date.setDate(recom_created_date.getDate() + 10); \\n ReqClariDatePPCon.value=\\"

\\"+constructMonth(recom_created_date)+\\"/\\"+recom_created_date.getDate()+\\"/\\"+recom_created_date.getFullYear()+\\"

\\";\\n if(recom_created_date <= todaydate){\\n ReqClariPPCon.enabled=false;\\n }\\n else{\\n ReqClariPPCon.enabled=true;\\n }\\n recom_created_date.setDate(recom_created_date.getDate() + 20); \\n ReqRecDatePPCon.value=\\"

\\"+constructMonth(recom_created_date)+\\"/\\"+recom_created_date.getDate()+\\"/\\"+recom_created_date.getFullYear()+\\"

\\";\\n ReqResDueDatePPCon.value=\\"

\\"+constructMonth(recom_created_date)+\\"/\\"+recom_created_date.getDate()+\\"/\\"+recom_created_date.getFullYear()+\\"

\\";\\n if(recom_created_date <= todaydate){\\n ReqResPanelPPCon.enabled=false;\\n ResponseRecomPPCon.enabled=false;\\n }\\n else{\\n ReqResPanelPPCon.enabled=true;\\n ResponseRecomPPCon.enabled=true;\\n }\\n }\\n else if(SelectDRADRB.value === \\"DRA\\" && meetingType===\\"Traditional\\"){\\n recom_created_date.setDate(recom_created_date.getDate() + 7);\\n ReqClariDatePPCon.value=\\"

\\"+constructMonth(recom_created_date)+\\"/\\"+recom_created_date.getDate()+\\"/\\"+recom_created_date.getFullYear()+\\"

\\";\\n if(recom_created_date <= todaydate){\\n ReqClariPPCon.enabled=false;\\n }\\n else{\\n ReqClariPPCon.enabled=true;\\n }\\n recom_created_date.setDate(recom_created_date.getDate() + 3); \\n ReqRecDatePPCon.value=\\"

\\"+constructMonth(recom_created_date)+\\"/\\"+recom_created_date.getDate()+\\"/\\"+recom_created_date.getFullYear()+\\"

\\";\\n ReqResDueDatePPCon.value=\\"

\\"+constructMonth(recom_created_date)+\\"/\\"+recom_created_date.getDate()+\\"/\\"+recom_created_date.getFullYear()+\\"

\\";\\n if(recom_created_date <= todaydate){\\n ReqResPanelPPCon.enabled=false;\\n ResponseRecomPPCon.enabled=false; \\n }\\n else{\\n ReqResPanelPPCon.enabled=true;\\n ResponseRecomPPCon.enabled=true;\\n }\\n }\\n else if(meetingType===\\"Informal\\"){\\n var clarifyDate = new Date(MeetDatePPCon.value.replace(\\"

\\"\,\\"\\").replace(\\"

\\"\,\\"\\"));\\n clarifyDate.setDate(clarifyDate.getDate() + 7); \\n ReqClariDatePPCon.value=\\"

\\"+constructMonth(clarifyDate)+\\"/\\"+constructDate(clarifyDate)+\\"/\\"+clarifyDate.getFullYear()+\\"

\\";\\n if(clarifyDate <= todaydate){\\n ReqClariPPCon.enabled=false;\\n }\\n else{\\n ReqClariPPCon.enabled=true;\\n } \\n clarifyDate.setDate(clarifyDate.getDate() + 7);\\n ReqResDueDatePPCon.value=\\"

\\"+constructMonth(clarifyDate)+\\"/\\"+constructDate(clarifyDate)+\\"/\\"+clarifyDate.getFullYear()+\\"

fd:scripts.fd:valueCommit: [{"script":{"content":"var docs=[];\\nguideBridge.getFileAttachmentsInfo({\\n success:function(list) {\\n for(var i=0; i<list.length;i++){\\n if(list[i].path.toString().split(\\".pdf\\").length>2){\\n var splitString = list[i].path.toString().split(\\".pdf\\");\\n var splitStringNeeded = splitString[0].split(\\"/\\"\,5);\\n var splitStringFinal = splitStringNeeded.join('/');\\n var finalString = splitString.join(\\".pdf\,\\"+splitStringFinal+\\"/\\").split(\\"\,\\");\\n var lastEle = finalString.pop();\\n for(var path in finalString){\\n //console.log(path);\\n if(finalString[path].includes(\\"ReqClariAttachPPCon\\")){\\n \\tdocs.push(finalString[path].replace(/\\\\n/g\,''));\\n }\\n }\\n }\\n else{\\n if(list[i].path.includes(\\"ReqClariAttachPPCon\\")){\\n docs.push(list[i].path);\\n }\\n }\\n }\\n FilePathsPPCon.value = docs;\\n }\\n});"\,"event":"Value Commit"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.RecommendationPanelPPCon.ReqClariPPCon.ReqClariAttachPPCon"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]
